title: Phe La Da Nang Cafe / 6717 Studio
description: Phe La Da Nang, located on Nguyen Van Linh Street, is a harmonious blend of modern and traditional architecture. More than just a popular spot for Oolong tea, this tea house offers a unique and tranquil experience that brings guests closer to nature.

title: House São Pedro / FGMF
description: The design of this house in a gated community in the interior of São Paulo was based on the principles of taking advantage of the views of the land to the lush vegetation in the surroundings and the integration between the construction and the external area of the lot.

title: Exploring A House and Barn Where Raw Materials Meet Scenic Views
description: Worrell Yeung has designed a two-part retreat in the wooded hills of Columbia County, New York, for a young family looking to connect with the landscape. Set on an 88-acre ridgeline, the project includes Ridge House and Ridge Barn, two structures that balance clean architecture with raw, expressive materials. Blending land art, local references, and a pared-back palette, the Brooklyn-based studio created a place that feels both grounded and quietly sculptural.
author: Erin

title: Inside a Japanese-Inspired Vineyard Home in Turkey
description: In an episode of Özlem Discovery, a YouTube channel known for unique home tours, viewers are introduced to a secluded vineyard house tucked away on a one-acre plot in the tranquil hills of Sapanca, Turkey. Designed with strong influences from Japanese architecture, the home offers a bold and refreshing take on vacation living, unlike anything typically seen in the region.
author: Erin

title: Porsche and Norman Foster Are Building Bridges Inspired by Dreams
description: Gateway to Venice's Waterway is a dynamic aluminum bridge leaping over water by Porsche and Norman Foster that inspires a new wave of mobility.

title: Z Museum by TEAM_BLDG Reimagines Rural Cultural Infrastructure
description: TEAM_BLDG transforms a 1990s concrete house into China's first contemporary rural weaving museum in Songzhuang Village.
